changeSet.id: Create BioCyc constraints and indexes
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Create constraints and indexes for BioCyc nodes, created on 03/10/2022

changeSet.id: load BioCycClass from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, date 03/10/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load BioCyc BioCycClass.tsv from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, 7565 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:BioCycClass:db_BsubCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.name=row.name,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.id: load Compound from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, date 03/10/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load BioCyc Compound.tsv from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, 5242 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:Compound:db_BsubCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.name=row.name,n.abbrev_name=row.abbrev_name,n.inchi_key=row.inchi_key,n.inchi=row.inchi,n.smiles=row.smiles,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.id: load DNABindingSite from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, date 03/10/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load BioCyc DNABindingSite.tsv from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, 831 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:DNABindingSite:db_BsubCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.abs_center_pos=row.abs_center_pos,n.site_length=row.site_length,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.id: load Gene from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, date 03/10/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load BioCyc Gene.tsv from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, 4536 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:Gene:db_BsubCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.name=row.name,n.accession=row.accession,n.left_end_position=row.left_end_position,n.right_end_position=row.right_end_position,n.strand=row.strand,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.id: load Terminator from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, date 03/10/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load BioCyc Terminator.tsv from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, 1147 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:Terminator:db_BsubCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.left_end_position=row.left_end_position,n.right_end_position=row.right_end_position,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load BioCyc Promoter.tsv from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, 1235 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:Promoter:db_BsubCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.name=row.name,n.pos_1=row.pos_1,n.strand=row.strand,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.id: load Reaction from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, date 03/10/2022

changeSet.comment: load BioCyc Reaction.tsv from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, 1727 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:Reaction:db_BsubCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.name=row.name,n.ec_number=row.ec_number,n.direction=row.direction,n.location=row.location,n.data_source='BioCyc'

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:Pathway:db_BsubCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.name=row.name,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.id: load EnzReaction from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, date 03/10/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load BioCyc EnzReaction.tsv from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, 1356 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:EnzReaction:db_BsubCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.name=row.name,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.id: load Regulation from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, date 03/10/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load BioCyc Regulation.tsv from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, 917 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:Regulation:db_BsubCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.mode=row.mode,n.mechanism=row.mechanism,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.id: load BioCycClass synonyms from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, date 03/10/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Load BioCyc BioCycClass-synonyms.tsv from BsubCyc-data-47.zip

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row MERGE (a:Synonym {name: row.name}) SET a.lowercase_name=toLower(row.name) WITH row, a MATCH (b:BioCycClass {eid: row.eid}) MERGE (b)-[r:HAS_SYNONYM]->(a)

changeSet.id: load Compound synonyms from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, date 03/10/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Load BioCyc Compound-synonyms.tsv from BsubCyc-data-47.zip

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row MERGE (a:Synonym {name: row.name}) SET a.lowercase_name=toLower(row.name) WITH row, a MATCH (b:Compound {eid: row.eid}) MERGE (b)-[r:HAS_SYNONYM]->(a)

changeSet.id: load TYPE_OF relationship in BioCycClass-rels.tsv from BsubCyc-data-47.zip, date 03/10/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Load BioCyc TYPE_OF relationships, BioCycClass-rels.tsv from BsubCyc-data-47.zip

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row with row where row.RELATIONSHIP='TYPE_OF' MATCH (a:db_BioCyc {eid: row.from_id}), (b:db_BioCyc {eid: row.to_id}) MERGE (a)-[r:TYPE_OF]->(b) RETURN COUNT(*)
